title: Hacking Hero: Hacker Clicker
description: Hacking Hero: Hacker Clicker is a captivating game that immerses you in the thrilling world of hacking. Counter trojans, breach firewalls, and extract valuable information while maintaining your anonymity. Battle against the M.E.D.U.S.A. that has seized control, using viruses and spyware to liberate the cyber realm. Embark on an RPG journey, aligning with 20 unlockable heroes to infiltrate and combat these malevolent creatures. Dive into the virtual world, leading the M1ssingN0s to action, all while concealing your true identity. Accumulate cryptocurrencies to enhance your hacking skills and those of your allies. Choose targets, prepare worms, and tap your way through hacking challenges. Join the fight to save the digital realm in Hacking Hero: Hacker Clicker!
